attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment for murderers, rapists, paedophiles and terrorists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister shall stop letting himself be bullied by 'human rights' activists. If their families were affected by any of the offences in question, they would change their selfish stances soon enough.

Those who take away the entitled rights that other people are entitled to, should not be allowed any such rights of their own.

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps with several in existence already:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/justiceforrape/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
